text:
The 10{+t}{+h}round of vaccination against foot and mouth disease in cattle would be launched in the district on March 1. The drive will continue till March 31, Collector S. Ganesh said in a press release. All village panchayat presidents had been informed about the schedule of the vaccination campaign, he said.

Special camp for

unorganised workers

A special camp to enrol members for the Tamil Nadu Unorganised Sector Welfare Board would be held at the Sengunthar Marriage Hall at Jayamkondam from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. on Wednesday. Construction workers, potters, tailors, weavers, carpenters, labourers of cashew and other industries can enrol as member so the board, Collector E. Saravanavelraj said in a press release.

LPG users' grievance redress meet

A special meeting to redress grievances relating to supply of LPG consumers would be held at the Collector’s Office here at 4 p.m. on February 26, Collector S.Ganesh said in a press release.
title: Vaccination against FMD
